offset.label: Offset
offset.helper: Adds or subtracts a constant value from the raw reading, this shifts the value a constant amount

multiplier.label: Multiplier:
multiplier.helper: Multiply the raw reading by a constant, this affects the slope of the response

multiplier2.label: Multiplier ^2:
multiplier2.helper: The Multiplier ^2 affects the curve of the correction

spike.label: Spike removal
spike.helper: If the change in the raw value between consecutive readings is greater than this value it will be ignored

limitmin.label: Min. limit
limitmin.helper: If the raw value is less this limit value it will be ignored

limitmax.label: Max. limit
limitmax.helper: If the raw value is greater than this limit value it will be ignored

helpers: Only applied to the Sea Level Pressure value supplied by your station
If the option for Cumulus calculated SLP is enabled, then this calibration will NOT be applied
Only applied to the station (or raw/absolute) pressure value supplied by your station
The altimeter pressure is dervied from the calibrated value
If the option for Cumulus calculated SLP is enabled, then this the calibration that will be applied

offset.label: Offset
offset.helper: Adds or subtracts a constant value from the raw reading, this shifts the value a constant amount

multiplier.label: Multiplier:

multiplier2.label: Multiplier ^2:

mininc.label: Minimum increment
helpers: The minimum increase in the laser depth value between consecutive readings for the value to added to the daily snowfall accumulation
NOTE: This is set in laser measurement units, not snow depth units

spike.label: Spike removal
helpers: If the change in the laser depth value between consecutive readings is greater than this value it will be ignored and not added to the daily snow accumulation
NOTE: This is set in laser measurement units, not snow depth units
